lead_paragraph: WEINER--Walter H. The ISEF Foundation Board of Trustees joins with ISEF's thousands of supporters, students, and alumni to mourn the passing of founding Trustee Walter Weiner. Together with ISEF Founders Edmond J. Safra z"l, Lily Safra, and his beloved wife, ISEF President Nina Weiner, Walter played a key role in establishing ISEF in 1977. With his stalwart leadership and support, ISEF has empowered some 7,000 young Israelis to rise out of immigrant backgrounds, earn degrees from BA to PhD, and become leaders in their fields. In 2011, Walter received ISEF's Lifetime Achievement Award for his enduring role throughout ISEF's history. We are eternally grateful for his dedication to educating underserved Israelis, and saddened at the passing of a man whose force of personality was exceeded only by his greatness of heart. May his wife Nina and all his family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. The ISEF Foundation Board of Trustees, Carlos Benaim, Chairman 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEINER, WALTER H
